params._authority: Address of the authority contract for access control

params._falconVerifier: Address of the Falcon verifier contract

validateTrade(address,address,uint256,ui.details: Checks trade size, frequency, and price impact

params.amount: Amount of tokens in the trade

returns._0: bool True if trade is valid

CIRCUIT_BREAKER_THRESHOLD().notice: Circuit breaker threshold in basis points (50%)

MAX_PRICE_IMPACT_BPS().notice: Maximum price impact in basis points (10%)

MAX_TRADE_SIZE_BPS().notice: Maximum trade size in basis points (5% of total supply)

MIN_TIME_BETWEEN_TRADES().notice: Minimum blocks between trades for a single address

TRADE_WINDOW().notice: Trading window duration for rate limiting

emergencyMode().notice: Emergency mode status - if true, all trading is suspended

falconVerifier().notice: IFalconVerifier instance used for Falcon signature verification

lastTradeTime(address).notice: Mapping of last trade timestamp per address

setFalconVerifier(address).notice: Sets the Falcon verifier contract address

tradingVolume(address).notice: Mapping of cumulative trading volume per address

usedSignatures(bytes32).notice: Mapping to track used signatures to prevent replay attacks

validateTrade(address,address,uint256,ui.notice: Validates a trade against security parameters

validationNonces(address).notice: Mapping of validation nonces per address
